title: Client Error on Queue Pop
body:
I am getting an error when  a queue pops for ranked that lets me accept but then it stays stuck on the accept/decline screen.. champ select comes up behind it but i can't interact with it because the queue pop won't go away. This has caused me to have to dodge on several occasions. I have fresh reinstalled the game and still get the same error. I have done the usual clear cache, end tasks, restart pc's etc.. Image below for reference. 

https://imgur.com/VTRcZEs

replies.body: Oh look.... it's happened to me again today. So sure enough i come to check what the response was the first time I reported the problem.. to my absolute shock (not) nobody has replied. Customer support is shocking.

This is just a community board, not a link to support, so if no-one in the community has a fix, chances are you won't get a response. If you want to talk to player support about an issue you have to submit a ticket directly: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I didn't answer this originally, because there was no known fix but it seemed to have been a temporary issue some people were having that resolved itself in a day or two (I had it myself too). If you're still experiencing it, I'd recommend submitting a ticket.
